mapper.update:
update commodity
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vip_vip = #{vipVip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vip_gold = #{vipGold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vip_diamond = #{vipDiamond,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gold_gold = #{goldGold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gold_diamond = #{goldDiamond,jdbcType=INTEGER},
diamond_diamond = #{diamondDiamond,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update commodity set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vip_vip = #{vipVip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vip_gold = #{vipGold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vip_diamond = #{vipDiamond,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gold_gold = #{goldGold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gold_diamond = #{goldDiamond,jdbcType=INTEGER}, diamond_diamond = #{diamondDiamond,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
